    • Enquiries

      public Enquiries(int campID, String enquiry, String reply, String replyBy, Student currentUser)
      Constructor for creating an Enquiries object.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the camp the enquiry is for
      enquiry - Enquiry text
      reply - Reply to the enquiry
      replyBy - CCM or staff who replied to the enquiry
      currentUser - Student who submitted the enquiry
